abstract: Charles Gould, a collector of microcars and other automotive curiosities, has a story to complement every one of his scores of acquisitions.
snippet: Charles Gould, a collector of microcars and other automotive curiosities, has a story to complement every one of his scores of acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: For last weekend's Auto Ego article, Charles Gould, a lawyer in Newton, Mass., gave me a tour of his collection of more than 100 cars, trucks and motorcycles.

headline.main: In Massachusetts, a Hoarder With Discriminating Tastes
